items.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
items.author: Thomas Edison

items.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
items.author: Yogi Berra

items.text: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
items.author: Abraham Lincoln

items.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
items.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

items.text: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
items.author: Byron Pulsifer

items.text: Be the chief but never the lord.
items.author: Lao Tzu

items.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
items.author: Carl Sandburg

items.text: Well begun is half done.
items.author: Aristotales

items.text: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
items.author: Yogi Berra

items.text: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
items.author: Margaret Sangster

items.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
items.author: Buddha

items.text: What you give is what you get.
items.author: Byron Pulsifer

items.text: We can only learn to love by loving.
items.author: Iris Murdoch

items.text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
items.author: Karen Clark

items.text: You'll see it when you believe it.
items.author: Wayne Dyer

items.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
items.author: Helen Keller

items.text: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
items.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

items.text: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
items.author: Bear Bryant

items.text: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
items.author: John F. Kennedy

items.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
items.author: Aristotle Onassis

items.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
items.author: Helen Keller

items.text: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
items.author: Bear Bryant

items.text: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
items.author: Warren Buffett

items.text: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
items.author: Vince Lombardi

items.text: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination..
items.author: Jimmy Dean

items.text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
items.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
